title: 3 and Out - Packers/Rodgers Soap Opera and Memorial Day Weekend Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Packers/Rodgers Soap Opera and Memorial Day Weekend Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John discusses the latest in the Aaron Rodgers/Packers divorce soap opera, and answers listener questions in the Memorial Day Weekend Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
